CRITICAL-MAGIC-1-TEXT: Normal damage and target vanishes, reappearing 1d4 rounds later.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-2-TEXT: All spell variables (not dice rolls) are maximized.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-3-TEXT: Double damage and target randomly loses one spell or one use of a magic ability.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-4-TEXT: Normal damage and normal damage of a random energy type.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-5-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-6-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-FRIGHTENED=frightened% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Wis saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-7-TEXT: Normal damage and dispel magic on the target.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-8-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-9-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 × 5 feets directly away.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-10-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-CHARMED=charmed% for 3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Cha saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-11-TEXT: Double damage. If the spell does electricity damage, the target %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-12-TEXT: Double damage and you may give the target 1 Suggestion (as the spell. %SAVE-CRITICAL=Cha saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-13-TEXT: Double damage. If the spell does cold damage, target takes 1d4 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-14-TEXT: Double damage and you become %STATUS-INVISIBLE=invisible% as the invisibility spell for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-15-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for one round.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-16-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-17-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to beasts and fey.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-18-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-PETRIFIED=petrified% for 1d4 hours (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-19-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-20-TEXT: Normal damage and target is affected by the Slow spell for 1d6 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-21-TEXT: Double damage and 2d6 random energy damage (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw halves%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-22-TEXT: Normal damage and target sent to a random plane (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Int saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-23-TEXT: Normal damage and target %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d4 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-24-TEXT: Double damage and ignore energy resistance (but not immunity).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-25-TEXT: Double damage and you and target switch places.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-26-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-27-TEXT: Double damage and target has disadvantage on saves vs. your spells for 1d6 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-28-TEXT: Normal damage this round and half damage each round for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-29-TEXT: Double damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% to a random ability score.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-30-TEXT: Double damage and target glows like Faerie fire for 1d6 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-31-TEXT: Double damage. If fire spell, target catches fire, taking 2d6 fire damage per round until extinguished.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-32-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to aberrations, fiends, celesitals and monstruosities.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-33-TEXT: Double damage. If acid spell, target takes 2d6 acid damage for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-34-TEXT: Double damage and target spends 1 round laughing (as Hideous laughter spell, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Wis saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-35-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCORPOREAL=incorporeal% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Int saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-36-TEXT: Normal damage and 2d6 necrotic damage as %STATUS-LIFE-DRAIN=life drain%, like a Specter attack (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates% after 1 day).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-37-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to giants and humanoids.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-38-TEXT: Double damage and an illusion appears to attack foe, flanking him for you for 1d6 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-39-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% (DC 20 Str or Dex to be freed).
CRITICAL-MAGIC-40-TEXT: Double damage or triple damage to dragons.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-41-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-42-TEXT: Normal damage. If the spell does elemental damage, an appropiate level elemental appears to serve for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-43-TEXT: Normal damage and half damage to all adjacent targets.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-44-TEXT: Double damage and target loses any scent and blindsight for 1 day.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-45-TEXT: Normal damage and target cannot cast spells or use abilities for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-46-TEXT: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-47-TEXT: Double damage and if the spell did elemental damage the target is now vulnerable to that element for 3 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-48-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-49-TEXT: Double damage and spell is not lost.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-51-TEXT: Normal damage. You are healed the same amount.
CRITICAL-MAGIC-52-TEXT: Normal damage and target is reduced for 3 rounds (as Reduce, %SAVE-CRITICAL=Wis saving throw negates%).
